channel.title: Need help please
channel.description: alright so i started thinking and then i realized my computer kept saying javac is not reconized. i did the class paths but i did them wrong i think i have update 6 im almost positive so i need someone to tell me the code i need to put in the CLASS and PATH than my server will be up please help Thanks, Random[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 06, 2008, 12:52:08 PM[/size][hr]umm please loL??

item.title: Need help please
item.dc:creator: @hidendra Hidendra
item.description:
@hidendra wrote:

Generalscape - Do you not know how to use quotes and how needed they are when using spaces in file names?

classpath: CLASSPATH="C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_06\bin";

path: "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_06\bin";

Without using quotes it thinks C:\Program is the classpath/path since there’s a space there.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help please
item.dc:creator: @Generalscape Generalscape
item.description:
@Generalscape wrote:

I’ll help ya out. Go to Start > Local Disk C:/ > My Computer > Program Files > Java. Check the file that starts with jdk… Now let’s say the file is jdk1.6.0_06. This would make your PATH file C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_06\bin; and would make your CLASSPATH CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_06\bin;%CLASSPATH%;. Hope it helped… rep me?.. jk

Read full topic

item.title: Need help please
item.dc:creator: @N11 -N-
item.description:
@N11 wrote:

I’m sure that this is easy to find. Go into the Tutorial Section and click “How to make a server” and read about what your are having problems with. Also if you downloaded Java, make sure it was JDK 6u6.

Read full topic
